price: They will not hear its slightest hissing, and they will abide forever in whatever their souls desire.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ
